title: Santos Dumont
overview: The story of the man who embodied the great transformations of the turn of the century, acclaimed almost worldwide as the father of aircraft piloting the 14-bis . Set in France and Brazil in the late 19th and early 20th centuries, the series follows the aviator's trajectory, from his childhood at his family's coffee plantations in the interior of Minas Gerais, to the sophisticated Paris lounges and air clubs.
